_header: The unlated woman the light man will lait
Subjects: women, against; chronicles, verse in; translations
_description: ‘Indisciplinata mulier’ — five couplets translating several Latin distichs in Fordun’s Scotichronicon, Book 14, Chap. 31

BLHar712.First Lines: The vnlatit woman the licht man wil laitGangis cortand In þe court hornit lik a gait…
BLHar712.Last Lines: …Als sikkir for to halde as a wete eillBot als trew in to hir tong as the mekil devill
